page.index.pageTitle: Cursify - AI that creates your content
page.index.firstLiner.punchline: AI that generates your content in seconds
page.login.title: Sign In
page.index.firstCase.explaination: Facebook Ad ? Blog Intro ? Product Description ? We have more than 40 categories.
page.index.secondCase.explaination: What do you want the AI to talk about ? Give it a few words to show it the way.
page.index.thirdCase.explaination: AI generates creative and relevant text based on what you entered. You can directly copy it and use it !
page.index.thirdLiner.slogan: Give a few words. Let the AI do the rest.
page.index.thirdLiner.explaination: Cursify uses technology based on AI. Thanks to Deep Learning, it is able to make connections that have never been done before. With just a few words, it can create specific text just for you.
